verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: is] attacking Peter Strzok , the FBI and the Justice Department to pre - emptively discredit the results of Robert Mueller 's Russia investigation .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] is [V: attacking] [ARG1: Peter Strzok , the FBI and the Justice Department] [ARGM-PRP: to pre - emptively discredit the results of Robert Mueller 's Russia investigation] .
